stimulusHtml: Assume that the current market equilibrium price for milk is $2.80 per gallon and that 5 million gallons are sold per day. If the government sets a price ceiling of $2.00 per gallon, which of the following is true?
choicesHtml: There will be an excess supply of milk in the market.
More than 5 million gallons of milk will be sold.
Less than 5 million gallons of milk will be sold.
